trans-unit.source: Describes a clone of a transaction providing guarantee that the transaction cannot be committed until the application comes to rest regarding work on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 描述事务的克隆，该克隆保证在应用程序停止事务上的工作之后才能提交事务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction> is a clone of a <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> object created using the <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.DependentClone%2A> method.
Its sole purpose is to allow the application to come to rest and guarantee that the transaction cannot commit while work is still being performed on the transaction (for example, on a worker thread).
trans-unit.target: 其唯一目的是允许应用程序到 rest 和保证工作仍在执行时 （例如，在辅助线程） 上的事务无法提交事务。

trans-unit.source: When the work done within the cloned transaction is finally complete and ready to be committed, it can inform the creator of the transaction using the <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须在克隆的事务中完成的工作，最后完成并可将其提交它可以通知创建者的事务使用<xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Thus you can preserve the consistency and correctness of data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以保留的一致性和数据的正确性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption> enumeration is used to determine the behavior on commit.
This behavior control allows an application to come to rest, as well as provides concurrency support.
trans-unit.target: 这种行为控制允许应用程序停止，以及提供并发支持。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how this enumeration is used, see [Managing Concurrency with DependentTransaction](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdad8468-2a90-4b81-8375-278067120cab).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用此枚举的详细信息，请参阅[与 DependentTransaction 管理并发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdad8468-2a90-4b81-8375-278067120cab)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to create a dependent transaction.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建依赖的事务。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to complete the dependent transaction.
Call this method when the dependent clone wants to inform the creator of the transaction that it has finished its work, and the transaction can be committed if the parent is also ready.
trans-unit.target: 当依赖克隆想要通知的事务创建者： 它已完成其工作，并可以提交事务，如果父还处于准备，请调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: After this call is invoked, you should not attempt any additional work on the transaction, or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此调用后，不应尝试在事务中，任何额外的工作或引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the application domain goes down after this method is called, and before the transaction is completed, the transaction might abort.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序域出现故障后调用此方法，并在事务完成之前，可能会中止事务。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method should be called only once during the dependent transaction's lifetime.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**应该依赖事务的生存期内仅一次调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt for additional work on the transaction after this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后任何针对此事务进行额外工作的尝试。

trans-unit.source: These include invoking methods such as <see cref="Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistVolatile" />, <see cref="Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable" />, <see cref="M:System.Transactions.Transaction.Clone" />, <see cref="M:System.Transactions.Transaction.DependentClone(System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption)" /> , or any serialization operations on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 这包括调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistVolatile" />、<see cref="Overload:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable" />、<see cref="M:System.Transactions.Transaction.Clone" />、<see cref="M:System.Transactions.Transaction.DependentClone(System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption)" /> 等方法，或针对事务的任何序列化操作。
